channel.title: KKT on Slow Data
channel.description: Recent content in KKT on Slow Data

item.title: Lagrangian Duality, KKT conditions, Linear
item.description:
Let’s imagine for a moment we are trying to solve a class of constrained optimization problems of the form

$$\begin{align*} &\inf_x f(x) \\ &\text{subject to } &g_i(x) \leq 0 \text{ for } 1 \leq i \leq m \ &h_j(x) = 0, \text{ for } 1 \leq j \leq n \end{align*} $$

where $f, g_1, \ldots, g_m, h_1, \ldots, h_m \in \mathcal{C}$ for $\mathcal{C}$ a fixed class of smooth functions. We fix such a problem $(P)$.
